description:
The morning after the attack from the assassins and the bomb scare, the cruise ship arrives at the resort island. Loid and Anya meet up with Yor and the three enjoy a family vacation!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Enjoy the Resort to the Fullest / Bragging About Vacation
La station balnéaire / Anya se vante de son week-end
Resort o Mankitsu Seyo / Kyuuka Jiman
リゾートを満喫せよ / 休暇自慢
